name: Blue Cheese and Asparagus Pizza
author: Cait
summary: My mother used to make this pizza; she didn't cook much so you know it's easy!  And it tastes great!
ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and snapped into pieces
1 teaspoon olive oil, or as needed
salt and black pepper to taste
1 (14 ounce) prebaked pizza crust (such as Boboli®)
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place asparagus on a baking sheet; drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper
Bake the asparagus in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
While asparagus is baking, spread the pizza sauce over the pizza crust
Distribute asparagus pieces and crumbles of blue cheese evenly over the pizza
Return pizza to center rack of preheated oven; bake until the cheese is melted and bubbling, 8 to 10 more minutes
